paste_safe_wallet:
Please complete the following steps

1. Create a wallet on safe

2. Enable {delegate_addr} module on the wallet

3. Paste the safe wallet address in the chat box
top_nfts_description: Below are the NFTs available to mint, please paste the id of the NFT you wish to purchase in the chat
mint_nft_message:
How to Mint: In order to mint from the above collections, please enter your selection in the text bar in the following format

(Collection Number, Quantity),(Collection Number, Quantity)
edit_selection_text:
please enter your selection in the text bar in the following format again

(Collection Number, Quantity),(Collection Number, Quantity)
